text: The 1992 NationsBank Classic was a men's tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts at the William H.G. FitzGerald Tennis Center in Washington, D.C. in the United States that was part of the Championship Series of the 1992 ATP Tour. It was the 24th edition of the tournament was held from July 13 through July 19, 1992. First-seeded Petr Korda won his second consecutive singles title at the event. ==Finals== ===Singles=== Petr Korda defeated Henrik Holm 6–4, 6–4 * It was Korda's first singles title of the year and the third of his career. ===Doubles=== Bret Garnett / Jared Palmer defeated Ken Flach / Todd Witsken 7–6, 6–3 ==References== ==External links== * Official website * ATP tournament profile Sovran Bank Classic Category:Washington Open (tennis) Category:1992 in sports in Washington, D.C. Category:1992 in American tennis
title: 1992 NationsBank Classic
